title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 350.0 - Approval of the superintendent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 350.0 - Approval of the superintendent

State Regulations

In addition to any specifically stated requirements for approval of the superintendent, the continuing care retirement community shall make a demonstration of actuarial validity and show that the proposed action will not adversely affect the continued financial viability of the continuing care retirement community. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
